```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(treemap)
library(janitor)
```

## INTERNAL SERVICE FUND
#Import data by reading each excel page as a csv and saving it to a dataframe
```{r}
df_01_sinking_fund_gen_op = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/01_SinkingFundGenOp_pg465.csv')
df_02_telephone_exc = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/02_TelephoneExchange_pg467-68.csv')
df_03_radio_comm = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/03_OfficeofRadioComm_pg472-73.csv')
df_04_motor_vehicle_mtn = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/04_MotorVehicleMtn_pg477-79.csv')
df_05_printing_reprod = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/05_Printing&Reproduc_pg482-83.csv')
df_06_health_insurance_fund = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/06_HealthSelfInsuranceFund_pg488.csv')
df_07_prescription_self_insurance_fund = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/07_PrscptnSelfInsrncFund_pg489.csv')
df_08_CCA_income_tax = read_csv('/Users/taylorjohnston/Desktop/data_viz_cle/cle-budget/InternalServiceFund/08_CCAIncomeTaxAdmin_pg493-95.csv')
```


#Get the 2017 Values for the Revenues section
```{r}
ISF_sinking_fund_gen_op_revenue_2017 <- df_01_sinking_fund_gen_op[29:32, 1:2]
ISF_telephone_exc_revenue_2017 <- df_02_telephone_exc[53:56, 1:2]
ISF_radio_comm_revenue_2017 <- df_03_radio_comm[61:64, 1:2]
ISF_motor_vehicle_mtn_revenue_2017 <- df_04_motor_vehicle_mtn[99:102, 1:2]
ISF_printing_reprod_revenue_2017 <- df_05_printing_reprod[68:71, 1:2]
ISF_health_insurance_fund_revenue_2017 <- df_06_health_insurance_fund[22:24, 1:2]
ISF_prescription_self_insurance_fund_revenue_2017 <- df_07_prescription_self_insurance_fund[6:8, 1:2]
ISF_CCA_income_tax_revenue_2017 <- df_08_CCA_income_tax[78:82, 1:2]
```

#Merge all the offices into one dataframe

```{r}
all_revenue_2017 <- Reduce(function(r_x,r_y) merge(x=r_x, y=r_y, by=1, all=TRUE),  
  list(ISF_sinking_fund_gen_op_revenue_2017,ISF_telephone_exc_revenue_2017,ISF_radio_comm_revenue_2017, ISF_motor_vehicle_mtn_revenue_2017, ISF_printing_reprod_revenue_2017, ISF_health_insurance_fund_revenue_2017,ISF_prescription_self_insurance_fund_revenue_2017, ISF_CCA_income_tax_revenue_2017))
```

#Rename first column
```{r}
names(all_revenue_2017)[1] <- 'revenue_2017'
names(all_revenue_2017)[2] <- 'Sinking Fund General Operation'
names(all_revenue_2017)[3] <- 'Telephone Exchange'
names(all_revenue_2017)[4] <- 'Office of Radio Communication'
names(all_revenue_2017)[5] <- 'Motor Vehicle revenue'
names(all_revenue_2017)[6] <- 'Printing and Reproduction'
names(all_revenue_2017)[7] <- 'Health Insurance Fund'
names(all_revenue_2017)[8] <- 'Prescription Self Insurance Fund'
names(all_revenue_2017)[9] <- 'CCA Income Tax Administration'
all_revenue_2017[8,1] <- "Total" #renaming row to "total"

all_revenue_2017 <- clean_names(all_revenue_2017) #cleans the column names
```

#Create file
```{r}
write.csv(all_revenue_2017,"all_revenue_2017.csv")
```
